reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Functional Padfolio for the Professional On-the-Go!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the STYLIO Padfolio Portfolio Organizer Binder, and I must say, it has truly impressed me with its functionality and sleek design. This padfolio has become an essential tool in keeping my professional life well-organized and stylishly managed.One of the standout features of this padfolio is its ability to keep my important documents, such as resumes and meeting notes, neatly arranged. The various compartments and pockets are intelligently designed, providing ample space for keeping my documents sorted and easily accessible. This aspect alone has made a significant impact on my efficiency during meetings and presentations.The sophisticated appearance of the padfolio is another highlight. Its sleek look exudes an air of professionalism and confidence, making me feel like a true "big girl boss" whenever I carry it. The attention to detail in the design is evident, and it adds a touch of elegance to my overall demeanor.The inclusion of strategically placed pockets for business cards is a feature I've come to appreciate. Having quick access to my business cards is essential, and the padfolio's design ensures that I can exchange contact information seamlessly during networking events.Moreover, the pen holder is a thoughtful addition that adds to the convenience of this padfolio. It keeps my pen secure and within easy reach, eliminating the need to search for a pen when I need to jot down important notes quickly.In conclusion, the STYLIO Padfolio Portfolio Organizer Binder has proven itself to be an invaluable asset in my professional life. Its smart organization features, combined with its chic appearance, make it a must-have accessory for anyone aiming to excel in their career. If you're looking for a padfolio that offers both style and function, this is definitely the one to consider!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Simple, inexpensive and professional looking. I bought this and a different set of note taking paper better for job interviews. The paper it comes with is just basic lined paper which is fine, but I feel like I look more professional with better paper. The portfolio is pretty durable as well, and the internal pocket is big enough to hold a few copies of your resume. That said, I wouldn’t go more than four or five sheets of paper. This is just a simple portfolio for maybe a meeting, job interview or some other short term use. Great item though, glad I bought it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m now ready for my interview!
reviews.reviewText: This is a good value. It well made and looks professional for a man or woman. Definitely appears more expensive than it was. It is exactly as it appears in the photos. There’s a pen holder in the middle and on the left side is a pocket the size of the notebook, a half size pocket, and 2 small business card size pockets.I’ve been searching for this type of notebook/portfolio for a few months, trying my best not to spend a lot of money and I finally found it with this.You won’t be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good quality
reviews.reviewText: The only con for me is the clipboard included with it is a bit flimsy, other than that it is really good quality. Its thin enough that it'll fit in my laptop bag along with the computer, and it has enough pockets to hold any documents I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Professional and practical
reviews.reviewText: Normally I take all my notes digitally but I was attending a conference where there wouldn’t be tabletops or space to put my laptop. I purchased this padfolio and I’m so glad I did. It was the perfect blend of professional while still keeping all of my papers, business cards and other materials tidy and organized. It worked well to write on top on my lap. Good product for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good portfolio for interviewing/recruiting
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use at career/job fairs, and it worked quite well. It looks professional and has a good notepad and pen holder. It is a bit hard to fit your resumes into the pockets, so I would recommend not taking too many or carrying them in a separate folder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for price
reviews.reviewText: This was needed for an interview and it worked great. Nice craftmanship, durability thus far. Exactly as advertised. Would buy again. Less cost than counterparts at OfficeMax, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprised by the quality!
reviews.reviewText: I was very pleasantly surprised by the quality of this clipboard. I got the foldback version, and it does indeed fold back fully. The leather material doesn't feel thin or cheap, like it will flake or tear like many low-cost Chinese products. Also, unlike another version I own, this one fully covers the clip area and doesn't have a cut-out in the front flap, exposing that area to the elements. Since the padding gives the clipboard some thickness, holding it on the side when folded back creates an excellent thick, rounded grip that feels ergonomic, unlike holding on to a thin, rigid metal or particle board slab. Overall, I highly recommend this leather folio clipboard. I use mine for doodling on loose sheets of paper.

Es muy buen producto, material y acabado. Solo que el color cafe no es igual al de la publicación. En la publicación se ve un tanto marrón (el que yo buscaba) pero en realidad es un color café oscuro.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ideal , parece de piel y por dentro muy completa , viene con un block
reviews.reviewText: Me ha gustado todo y me ha sorprendido lo completa q es
comodo, elegante ottimo rapporto qualità-prezzo o ottimo come idea regalo

Angeschafft, um bei Bewerbungsgesprächen zumindest optisch ein wenig seriöser zu wirken. Ist halt nicht so der Hit, wenn man dort mit nem abgewetzten Collegeblock auftaucht. Wenn man jedoch so einen Organizer unter dem Arm trägt, nach der Begrüßung und dem Platz nehmen vor sich öffnet und offenbart, dass man darin seine Unterlagen säuberlich sortiert hat und ggf. Auch schon Notizen im Vorfeld angefertigt hat, dann macht das was her.Und genau dafür reicht das Padfolio vollkommen aus. Ein kleines, aber störendes Manko ist jedoch, dass sich mehrere DIN A4 Blätter auf der linken Seite nicht ohne Gefrickel einführen lassen. Das ist Recht unangenehm. Auch ist wenig Platz für mehr als einen Kugelschreiber, geschweige denn weitere Stifte. Das bekommt man aber trotzdem hin.Nicht perfekt, aber völlig okay!
